long_description: Featuring an armored, 20mm thick cable, the OnGuard Rottweiler keyed cable lock offers stout security for your bike. The 3 ft. 3 in., 20mm thick cable is made of heavy-duty, twisted steel that's encased in a cut-resistant, hardened steel sheath for excellent security. X2P Double Bolt lock mechanism secures cable to lock head in 2 places for high pull and pry resistance; dust cover helps protect lock internals. Z-Cylinder tumbler is bump-proof and resists picking, pulling or drilling. Vinyl coating on cable armor and double rubber coating on the lock head help protect paint and finishes. Comes with 5 laser-cut keys, 1 of which has an integrated LED light. OnGuard rates the OnGuard Rottweiler keyed cable lock as a 48 out of 100 on their 100-point security rating system, where higher-rated locks offer increased security.
short_description: Featuring an armored, 20mm thick cable, the OnGuard Rottweiler keyed cable lock offers stout security for your bike.
